content: As He was going out of the temple, one of His disciples *said to Him, “Teacher, look! What wonderful stones and what wonderful buildings!”
As He was sitting on the Mount of Olives opposite the temple, Peter, James, John, and Andrew were questioning Him privately,
“Tell us, when will these things come about, and what  the sign when all these things are going to be fulfilled?”
And Jesus began to say to them,
